products.name: Custom Photo Lithophane
products.description: Transform your favorite photos into stunning 3D printed lithophanes. These unique art pieces reveal beautiful images when backlit, creating a magical display perfect for home decor or as a personalized gift.

materialOptions.name: White PLA
materialOptions.description: Best for lithophanes - allows light to pass through

products.name: Lithophane Keyring
products.description: Carry your memories everywhere! Compact lithophane keyring featuring your favorite photo. A perfect personalized accessory or gift that you can take with you wherever you go.

products.name: AF1 Mini Keyring
products.description: Miniature Nike Air Force 1 sneaker keychain with detailed design. Features authentic sneaker details including laces, swoosh logo, and textured sole. Perfect accessory for sneaker enthusiasts and collectors.
